Description: Fragment of rim and neck of East Greek pottery column-krater; inside of neck glazed with added red band lined in white; maeander band on top of rim, dots on outside; underside of rim and neck glazed; graffito on top of rim.
Curator's comments: Marked in pencil '13'. From same vessel as 1965,0930.714 & 716. C.A. Hutton, 'Inscriptions on pottery from Naukratis' Classical Review 7 (1893) 83, III.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.10560)
